original: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Therefore, since the condition of contact on the tongue is non-existent, the condition of contact on the tongue is emptiness, the condition of contact on the tongue is isolated, the condition of contact on the tongue is without entity,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and since a bodhisattva, the past, the future, and the middle are all not two and not divided,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because the feeling that arises from the condition of contact on the body is non-existent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the naturelessness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because of the nonexistence of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because of the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the isolation of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because of the naturelessness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because of the nonexistence of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present.🔽Because of the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the isolation of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present.🔽Because of the naturelessness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present.🔽Because of the nonexistence of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the three times.🔽Because of the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the three times.🔽Because of the isolation of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the three times.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg @496a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg @496a *//
translated: Because of the naturelessness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of the body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the three times.🔽“Moreover, Su­bhūti, the emptiness of internal phenomena is not subject to affliction, and it is not subject to purification.

original: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the isolation of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the naturelessless of the condition of contact through the coming together of body, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the condition of contact by means of the body is not perceived in the past,🔽the condition of contact by means of the body is not perceived in the future,🔽and the condition of contact by means of the body is not perceived in the present.🔽The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and emptiness another.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /

translated: The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and its lack of arising another.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /🔽dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and its lack of cessation another.🔽The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and its lack of purity another.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg @496b pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

translated: The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and the absence of appropriation another.🔽The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and the absence of fear another.🔽The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and the absence of affliction another.🔽The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and the absence of attributes another.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The condition of contact by means of the body is not one thing, and the absence of intrinsic defining characteristics another.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is also not one thing,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the present is also not one thing.

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded is void, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir @497a *//

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because there is no feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the later limit.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the end of the future.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the isolation of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the end of the future.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the absence of an own-being of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the end of the future.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

translated: Because of the emptiness of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the isolation of the causal condition of contact through the coming together of mental faculty, phenomena, and mind consciousness, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because feelings conditioned by sensory contact that is the coming together of the mental faculty, objects of thought, and the corresponding consciousness are essenceless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, the emptiness of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty, the isolation of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do ////
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do ////
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded is essenceless, and the bodhisattva, the past, the future, and the middle—all these are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems @498a *//

analyzed: dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of contact, the emptiness of contact, the isolation of contact, the naturelessness of contact, and the bodhisattva are not two, nor are they divided into two.

translated: The past is not one thing, the future is not another, and the middle is not another. All of these are not two, nor are they divided into two.

translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended at the later limit because the perfection of generosity does not exist.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended at the later limit because the perfection of generosity is empty.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended at the later limit because the perfection of generosity is essentially nonexistent.

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle because the perfection of generosity does not exist.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the perfection of giving is empty, a bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the middle.🔽Because the perfection of giving is isolated, a bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the middle.🔽Because the perfection of giving is non-apprehensible, a bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the middle.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the perfection of morality is isolated, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

translated: Because the perfection of morality is without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.🔽Because the perfection of morality does not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of the perfection of morality, the emptiness of the perfection of morality, the lack of an intrinsic nature of the perfection of morality, the lack of a being of the perfection of morality, the lack of a life of the perfection of morality, the lack of an individual of the perfection of morality, the lack of a person of the perfection of morality, the lack of a human of the perfection of morality, the lack of a human being of the perfection of morality, the lack of a nourisher of the perfection of morality, the lack of a knower of the perfection of morality, the lack of a viewer of the perfection of morality, the lack of an agent of the perfection of morality, and the lack of an experiencer of the perfection of morality are not one thing, and the perfection of morality another.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom does not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben @518b pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben @518b pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the isolation of the perfection of wisdom, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the absence of an intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the absence of the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom, the isolation of the perfection of wisdom, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom are not apprehended as the end,

analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do ////
translated: the later limit, and the middle—all of these are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

analyzed: bam po don bdun pa //

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because of the non-existence of inner emptiness.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because of the emptiness of inner emptiness.

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because of the isolation of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because inner emptiness is non-apprehensible, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the limit of the past.🔽Because inner emptiness is empty, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the limit of the future.🔽Because inner emptiness is void, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the limit of the future.

translated: Because inner emptiness is essentially non-apprehensible, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the limit of the future.🔽Because inner emptiness is non-apprehensible, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the middle.

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so; ;nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because inner emptiness is empty, the bodhisattva is not discerned in the middle.

original: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of internal phenomena being void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

analyzed: @519b nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: If you ask why, Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽it is because the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the voidness of internal phenomena, and the essence of internal phenomena are not one thing, and bodhisattvas are not another.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /🔽dbus mi dmigs te /🔽nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te / nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the voidness of internal phenomena, and the essence of internal phenomena are not one thing, and the past is not another.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the voidness of internal phenomena, and the essence of internal phenomena are not one thing, and the future is not another.

original: nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the voidness of internal phenomena, and the essence of internal phenomena are not one thing, and the present is not another.

original: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is not one thing, and the past is not another.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not one thing, and the future is not another.

original: nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is not one thing, and the present is not another.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is not one thing, and bodhisattvas are not another.

analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of inner emptiness, the emptiness of inner emptiness, the isolation of inner emptiness, the absence of an intrinsic nature of inner emptiness,

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: Therefore, since the emptiness of great extensity, the emptiness of the emptiness of great extensity, the isolation of the emptiness of great extensity, and the non-entityness of the emptiness of great extensity are all without entityness,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: bodhisattvas, the earlier and later limits, and the middle are not two and cannot be made two.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang @523b chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽because the emptiness of the ultimate is non-existent, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the earlier limit.

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of the emptiness of the ultimate is empty, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the earlier limit.

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of ultimate reality is essentially insubstantial, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of the emptiness of ultimate reality is not another,

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of what is beyond extremes another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of what is beyond arising and ceasing another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of what is beyond all mental constructions another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of essential nature another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of essential nature being unproduced another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of essential nature being unceasing another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of essential nature being originally quiescent another.

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of essential nature being devoid of intrinsic nature another.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /

translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the present another.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra, the emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the absence of ultimate reality another.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the emptiness of ultimate reality another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu; de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /

translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not one thing, and the isolation of ultimate reality another.

translated: The ultimate, emptiness, and the lack of an own-being, the bodhisattva, the past, the future, and the middle—all these are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because conditioned emptiness does not exist.

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: Because the applications of mindfulness are without an essential nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the applications of mindfulness are not existent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

translated: The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the signlessness of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the wishlessness of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the unconditionedness of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the non-arising of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the non-production of the applications of mindfulness another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness another.

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: in that way, the absence of the applications of mindfulness, the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness, the isolation of the applications of mindfulness, the lack of intrinsic nature of the applications of mindfulness, the bodhisattva, the past, the future, and the present—none of these are dual and none are not dual.

translated: Because the factors of awakening are non-existent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the limit of the past.🔽Because the factors of awakening are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the limit of the past.🔽Because the factors of awakening are void, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the limit of the past.

translated: Because the emptiness of the factors of awakening is not the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva, and the emptiness of the emptiness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva.🔽Because the signlessness of the factors of awakening is not the perfection of wisdom, the signlessness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva, and the emptiness of the signlessness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva.🔽Because the wishlessness of the factors of awakening is not the perfection of wisdom, the wishlessness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva, and the emptiness of the wishlessness of the factors of awakening is not the bodhisattva.

original: @544a *// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /🔽dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: @544a *// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: “The past limit of concentration is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gtan med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Concentration is non-apprehensible, its past limit is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past limit of the emptiness of concentration is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.🔽The past limit of the signlessness of concentration is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gtan dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past limit of the wishlessness of concentration is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past limit of the emptiness of essential nature of concentration is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past limit of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.🔽The past limit of the emptiness of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.🔽The past limit of the signlessness of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.🔽The past limit of the wishlessness of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.🔽The past limit of the emptiness of essential nature of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The past limit of the emptiness of essential nature of the emptiness of essential nature of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, its future limit is non-apprehensible, and its present middle is non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na bsam gtan med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na bsam gtan med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: Therefore, the absence of concentration, the emptiness of concentration, the isolation of concentration, the naturelessness of concentration, and the bodhisattva are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The past, future, and present are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the bodhisattva is not apprehended because the immeasurables do not exist.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended because the immeasurables are empty.

original: tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended because the immeasurables are isolated.

original: tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the immeasurables are without an essential nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.

original: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub @544b sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub @544b sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the immeasurables do not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the immeasurables are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the immeasurables are isolated, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the immeasurables are without an essential nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the immeasurables do not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the immeasurables are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshad med pa dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so; ;tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so /

translated: Because the immeasurables are essentially nonexistent, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

translated: the nonexistence of the immeasurables, the emptiness of the immeasurables, the voidness of the immeasurables, the naturelessness of the immeasurables, and the essencelessness of the immeasurables are not apprehended in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /

analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / tshad med pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

analyzed: tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan pa yin /

translated: in that way, the infinitude that is not, the infinitude that is emptiness, the infinitude that is isolated, the infinitude that is essenceless, the bodhisattva,

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the middle, the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽Because the emptiness of inherent existence is not the middle, the emptiness of inherent existence is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽Because the emptiness of all phenomena is not the middle, the emptiness of all phenomena is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the middle, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of non-existence is not the middle, the emptiness of non-existence is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of non-existence.🔽Because the emptiness of essential nature is not the middle, the emptiness of essential nature is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of essential nature.🔽Because the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the middle, the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems @549a *//🔽dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems @549a *// dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the emptiness of inherent existence is not the middle, the emptiness of inherent existence is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Because the emptiness of all phenomena is not the middle, the emptiness of all phenomena is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽Because the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the middle, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽Because the emptiness of non-existence is not the middle, the emptiness of non-existence is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of non-existence.🔽Because the emptiness of essential nature is not the middle, the emptiness of essential nature is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of essential nature.🔽Because the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the middle, the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the extremes, and the extremes are not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Because the emptiness of inherent existence is not the middle, the emptiness of inherent existence is not the extremes

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are isolated from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are without an essence in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are not the past,🔽are not the future,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /🔽dbus su dmigs te /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus su dmigs te / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and are not the present.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are not one thing and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation another.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are not one thing and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation another.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation is not one thing, and the signless and the wishless gates of liberation are not something else.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation is not one thing, and the emptiness of the emptiness gate of liberation is not something else.🔽The signless gate of liberation is not one thing, and the emptiness of the signless gate of liberation is not something else.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The wishless gate of liberation is not one thing, and the emptiness of the wishless gate of liberation is not something else.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The bodhisattva is not one thing, and the emptiness of the bodhisattva is not something else.

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past is not one thing, and the emptiness of the past is not something else.🔽The future is not one thing, and the emptiness of the future is not something else.

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The present is not one thing, and the emptiness of the present is not something else.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de @549b ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de @549b ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: in that way, the nonexistence of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, and the emptiness of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the applications of mindfulness are the applications of mindfulness, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the applications of mindfulness are not the applications of mindfulness.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the right efforts are the right efforts, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the right efforts are not the right efforts.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the legs of manifestation are the legs of manifestation, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the legs of manifestation are not the legs of manifestation.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the faculties are the faculties, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the faculties are not the faculties.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the powers are the powers, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the powers are not the powers.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the branches of enlightenment are the branches of enlightenment, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the branches of enlightenment are not the branches of enlightenment.

original: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the path are the path, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are not the path are not the path.

original: mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are void, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are without an intrinsic nature, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are non-existent, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.🔽Because the superknowledges are empty, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems @550a *//🔽dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems @550a *// dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are void, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are without an intrinsic nature, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future.

original: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are non-existent, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are empty, a bodhisattva cannot be found in the middle.🔽Because the superknowledges are isolated, a bodhisattva cannot be found in the middle.

original: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the superknowledges are without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva cannot be found in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mngon par shes pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the absence of the superknowledges, the emptiness of the superknowledges, the isolation of the superknowledges, and the absence of an intrinsic nature of the superknowledges are not found in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: are not found in the future,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽mngon par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / mngon par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and are not found in the present.🔽The absence of the superknowledges is not one thing,🔽the emptiness of the superknowledges is not another,

original: mngon par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the isolation of the superknowledges is not another.

original: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The non-entityness of the superknowledges is not one thing,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the bodhisattvas are not another;

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the past is not one thing,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is not another,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the present is not another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽thus the superknowledges are not one thing, and emptiness is not another;🔽the superknowledges are not one thing, and isolation is not another;

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa med pa gang @550b yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa med pa gang @550b yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the superknowledges are not one thing, and the lack of an intrinsic nature is not another;🔽the bodhisattvas are not one thing, and the past is not another;🔽the future is not another, and the present is not another.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: All of these are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of samādhi, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the limit of the past.🔽Because of the emptiness of samādhi, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the limit of the future.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: Because of the emptiness of samādhi, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the limit of the future.🔽Because of the emptiness of samādhi,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of meditative stabilization, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the nonexistence of meditative stabilization, the emptiness of meditative stabilization, the isolation of meditative stabilization, and the naturelessness of meditative stabilization are not apprehended in the past,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: are not apprehended in the future,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and are not apprehended in the middle.🔽The nonexistence of meditative stabilization is not one thing,

original: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of meditative stabilization is not another,

original: ting nge 'dzin dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the bodhisattvas is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another;

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the signless is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another;🔽the wishless is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another;🔽the unproduced is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another;🔽the unattained is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another;

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: the uneffected is not one thing, and the bodhisattvas another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: in that way, the absence of samādhi, the emptiness of samādhi, the signless of samādhi, the wishless of samādhi, the unproduced of samādhi, the unattained of samādhi, and the uneffected of samādhi, and the bodhisattvas,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the past, the future, and the present, are all not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa @551b sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa @551b sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

original: gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: The bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the limit of the future because of the signlessness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: The bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the limit of the future because of the wishlessness of the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The bodhisattva cannot be apprehended in the limit of the future because of the absence of contaminants and the absence of purification in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the tathāgatas’ powers are without an essential nature, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the future.

translated: the middle is also not other than that.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: thus the absence of fear, the emptiness of fear, the isolation of fear, the naturelessness of fear, and the bodhisattva—

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: all these are not two, nor are they divided into two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽because of the nonexistence of the analytical knowledges, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the analytical knowledges, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit;🔽because of the isolation of the analytical knowledges, the bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the analytical knowledges are void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the past.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the analytical knowledges are without an intrinsic nature, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the past.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i @554b mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: Because the analytical knowledges are not existent, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the analytical knowledges are empty, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the analytical knowledges are void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the analytical knowledges are without an intrinsic nature, bodhisattvas are not apprehended at the limit of the future.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
