analyzed: de ltar na snying rje chen po med pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' @556a *// gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Great compassion is essenceless, and emptiness is essenceless.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽bodhisattvas are not apprehended because the unique qualities of the Buddha are non-existent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Bodhisattvas are not apprehended because the unique qualities of the Buddha are empty.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are void, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are nonapprehensible, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are inherently nonapprehensible, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are signless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are wishless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are without defilement or purification, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not turned toward anything, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are calm, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the past.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are void, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are nonapprehensible, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are inherently nonapprehensible, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are signless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are wishless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are without defilement or purification, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not turned toward anything, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are calm, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the limit of the future.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are void, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the present.🔽Because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are nonapprehensible

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi @556b phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi @556b phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the unentangled qualities of the Buddha do not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are isolated, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are essenceless, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are not apprehended in the past,🔽the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are not apprehended in the future,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: and the unentangled qualities of the Buddha are not apprehended in the present.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the future is not found,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the middle is not found.🔽The distinct attributes of a buddha are not one thing, and emptiness another;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are not one thing, and the lack of intrinsic nature another;🔽the distinct attributes of a buddha are not one thing, and emptiness another;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are not one thing, and the lack of inherent existence another;🔽a bodhisattva is not one thing, and the past another;

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is not another,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the middle is not another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @557a *//
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @557a *//
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of the unshared qualities of a buddha, the emptiness of the unshared qualities of a buddha, the isolation of the unshared qualities of a buddha, and the absence of an essence in the unshared qualities of a buddha,

original: ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and the bodhisattva, and the prior limit, and the later limit, and the middle—all those are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽Furthermore, because the dharma-constituent does not exist, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit.

original: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the dharma-constituent is empty, a bodhisattva is not apprehended at the prior limit.

original: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the dharma-dhātu is void.

original: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the dharma-dhātu is essenceless.

original: chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the dharma-dhātu does not exist.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the dharma-dhātu is empty.

original: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the dharma-dhātu is void.

original: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the dharma-dhātu is essenceless.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle because the dharma-dhātu does not exist.

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle because the dharma-dhātu is empty.

original: chos kyi dbyings dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @557b dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @557b dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the dharma-constituent is void, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the dharma-constituent is without an intrinsic nature, a bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the dharma-constituent is not one thing, and the emptiness of the dharma-constituent, the voidness of the dharma-constituent, the naturelessness of the dharma-constituent, and the dharma-constituent itself another;

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽chos kyi dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / chos kyi dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the past is not one thing, and the future and present another;🔽and the dharma-constituent is not one thing, and the past, future, and present another.🔽The dharma-constituent is not one thing, and the emptiness of the dharma-constituent another,

original: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the voidness of the dharma-constituent not one thing, and the dharma-constituent another,

original: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the naturelessness of the dharma-constituent not one thing, and the dharma-constituent another,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and a bodhisattva not one thing.

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The past limit is not one thing,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future limit is not another,🔽and the middle is not another.

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no; ;tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: de ltar na chos kyi dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of the dharma-constituent, the emptiness of the dharma-constituent, the isolatedness of the dharma-constituent, the absence of intrinsic nature of the dharma-constituent, the bodhisattva,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the past limit, the future limit, and the middle are all not two and cannot be made two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi @558a *//

analyzed: dmigs so // de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the real nature, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: de bzhin nyid med pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the nonexistence of suchness, the emptiness of suchness, the isolation of suchness, and the essential insubstantiality of suchness are not one thing, and a bodhisattva is not another.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: The past limit is not apprehended,🔽the future limit is not apprehended,

original: @558b dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: @558b dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: and the middle is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The nonexistence of suchness is not one thing,

original: de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the emptiness of suchness is not another,

original: de bzhin nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the isolation of suchness is not another,

original: de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the essential insubstantiality of suchness is not another.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The bodhisattva is also not one thing,🔽the past is also not one thing,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is also not one thing,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the middle is also not one thing.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: in that way, the nonexistence of suchness, the emptiness of suchness, the isolation of suchness, the naturelessness of suchness, the bodhisattva,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the past, the future, and the middle are all not two and cannot be made two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: in addition, because the very limit of reality does not exist, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended prior to the limit of the past because the limit of the past is empty of the limit of the past.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended prior to the limit of the past because the limit of the past is isolated from the limit of the past.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended prior to the limit of the past because the limit of the past is non-apprehensible.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is empty of the limit of the future.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is isolated from the limit of the future.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi @559a *//
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi @559a *//
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is non-apprehensible.

original: dmigs so // yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dmigs so // yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is empty of the limit of the future.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is isolated from the limit of the future.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the limit of the future is non-apprehensible.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the very limit of reality is infinite, the middle of the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the very limit of reality is emptiness, the middle of the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the very limit of reality is isolated, the middle of the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the very limit of reality is without an essence, the middle of the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the infinite very limit of reality, the emptiness of the very limit of reality, the isolation of the very limit of reality, and the essence-less-ness of the very limit of reality are not apprehended as a prior limit,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: not apprehended as a later limit,

original: dbus mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: and not apprehended as a middle.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The infinite very limit of reality is not one thing, and the bodhisattva another;

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the limit of reality is not one thing,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the isolatedness of the limit of reality is not another,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the lack of inherent existence of the limit of reality is not another.🔽The bodhisattva is not one thing,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma @559b yin; sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma @559b yin; sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the prior limit is not another,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the later limit is not another,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the middle is not another.
